message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a special price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Alice, $15,000 is way too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $8,500.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents the high value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I'm confident you'll find that a fair price.
Alice, I really appreciate you coming down on the price, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go to $9,500.  This is my final offer.
Bob, I understand your position.  Let's meet in the middle at $11,000. This is my final offer, and I believe it's a very fair price for a product of this value.
